title: Play With Me
description: Shay Reynolds is the tough captain of the Rugby Team that won the Premiership Trophy last year. Today, she has to play against Liv Morgan, the love of her life who left her.Shay is heartbroken, but she is a fierce competitor and so is Liv. They both know that Rugby comes first. Can Shay hold herself together and lead her team to victory?What happened to tear them apart?What will happen when they collide on the field and all of those buried feelings come rushing back?
author: Margaux Fox
